::Prowl::

His boosters blazing, Prowl flies over what will soon be Egypt. He 
would get to the crash site soon.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> The ship that burns through the atmosphere is on a coarse towards 
turkey,
> and huge shockwaves from the sound of its engines blowing up, 
scatter the
> earth. Inside, the little red robot in the control chair gets flung 
back
> out of the chair and against the larger robot who is trying to put 
out the
> fires with liquid nitrogen. The two collide, and land in the stream 
of
> Liquid Nitrogen, being frozen in the beam. The little blue robot 
presses
> the button on the control pad to keep the emergency message playing 
at
> intervals, and just as he presses it, he is flung up against and 
engine
> wall, his back being seriously burnt, and a sickening thud can be 
heard as
> his head hits metal, and rips apart.
> 
> The ship then makes hard impact with the ground, and leaves a huge 
running
> crater as it moves forward, through the earth. It then runs to a 
stop, and
> the back of it explodes violently, sending pieces of burning 
shrapnel miles
> around. The two frozen robots get thrown violently, and the larger 
ones
> casing shatters, as his arm goes with it, he weakly looks up, and 
then
> colapses. Everything turns silent, except for the repeating message,
> "emergency, our ship is out of control, we will require assistance, 
and
> more than likely,
> repairs when we crash".
